title: 1BD 1BTH + W/D + 24/7 GYM + Dog Park + Location
posting_body: Where neighbors become friends and ideas turn into adventures.
Spacious, newly renovated apartments in North Seattle.
Stylish Seattle Living tucked away just south of Haller Lake you'll spoil yourself with stainless steel appliances and rich quartz counter tops under designer lighting with modern paint and trim.
Every apartment has lush new carpets and luxury vinyl floors.
Luxer package services to ensure your package is received and a short drive to Northgate Mall and Greenlake where you can enjoy shopping, dining, and outdoor fun.
Work out on your own time with complimentary access to a wide variety of gym equipment.

The Haller Post fitness center is fully stocked with free weights, exercise bikes, treadmills, punching bags, and multi-station strength machines, filling a bountiful space with the latest exercise toys.
Let your dogs run wild in the off-leash dog park as you relax in the connected BBQ lounge.
Meet new friends and make connections in our relaxed community zone.
Dogs can enjoy the outdoor obstacle course and play fetch in the extensive outdoor space.
In natural Northwest Seattle, Haller Post Apartments are just one block away from Haller Lake and Northacres Park.
Enjoy the great outdoors while staying close to home.
Visit the shore of Puget Sound or go for a SUP or paddle boat ride at Greenlake.
Go whale-watching, hiking, and sightseeing in this wildlife-filled part of Seattle.
East of Carkeek Park, north of Woodland Park Zoo, and west of Northgate mall, Haller Post residents enjoy every facet of Seattle life.
Visit shops and restaurants within walking distance of home.
Fill your pallet with Thai and Mexican food, or enjoy fresh sushi and local seafood.
Treat yourself and go shopping on a whim.
Enjoy city life without the crowds.
Use this link for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 735 Sq.
- Lots of Windows offering beautiful bright interiors
- Designer lighting, paint colors and trim
- Vinyl plank flooring throughout living area.
- Wood burning Fireplaces with stylish tile surround
- Managed by award winning Thrive Management.
- Easy access to many nearby restaurants, shops, parks, highways, and much more.
$50 pet rent per month for dogs
$35 pet rent per month for cats
Breed restrictions apply, no weight limit
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
